description:
Yaakov Smith

When proving somebody’s identity, it’s usually an important matter and critical to get right. With digital licences springing up around the globe, including here in New South Wales, how can we be sure that the computer is telling the truth? Does digitising the process actually improve it?

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/new-phone-who-dis-human-authentication-in-the-digital-age

PyCon AU, the national Python Language conference, is on again this August in Sydney, at the International Convention Centre, Sydney, August 24 - 28 2018.

Video licence: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Python, PyCon, PyConAU

Fri Aug  2 10:30:00 2019 at Cockle Bay
title: New Phone, Who Dis?: Human Authentication in the Digital Age
